faq.howEmojiKeyWorks: How does the emoji key work?
faq.howEmojiKeyWorksAnswer: The emoji key is a unique identifier to confirm channel ownership. Our system automatically scans the channel description to detect the key.
faq.whyVerificationFailsAnswer: Verification can fail if the emoji key is not placed correctly or the channel URL is invalid. It may also take a little time for changes to be detected.
faq.multipleChannels: Can I register multiple platform channels?
faq.multipleChannelsAnswer: Yes. You can register and manage multiple channels across YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, etc. Each platform is issued a unique emoji key.

what_is_audionyx.question: What is Audionyx?
what_is_audionyx.answer: Audionyx provides highâ€‘quality music that creators can use without copyright concerns and shares the resulting music revenue with creators.

service_cost.question: Is there any cost to use the service?
service_cost.answer: All Audionyx services are free to use. Music download, channel registration, revenue sharing, and all features are available at no extra cost.

login_required.question: Can I use the service without logging in?
login_required.answer: The Find Music and Brand pages are available without login. However, Channel Management, Track Production requests, and Bank Account registration require login.

longform_usage.question: Can I use Audionyx tracks in longâ€‘form videos?
longform_usage.answer: Yes. Unlike Shorts, revenue share for longâ€‘form videos may differ. Detailed conditions will be announced separately.

other_platforms.question: Is payout supported on platforms other than YouTube?
other_platforms.answer: Twitch and AfreecaTV are not yet supported for auto settlement but are planned for H2 2025. TikTok and Instagram Reels are under review.

social_to_email.question: Can I switch from social login to email login?
social_to_email.answer: In Account Settings > Login Methods, set an email and password to add an additional login method. Your social login remains available.

withdraw_data.question: If I reâ€‘register after account deletion, will my previous settlement data be restored?
withdraw_data.answer: If you reâ€‘register within 30 days, previous settlement history and channel registrations are restored. After 30 days, itâ€™s treated as a new account and past data wonâ€™t be restored.

registration_requirements.question: Are there requirements such as subscribers or views to register a channel?
registration_requirements.answer: No. Audionyx welcomes all creators. Anyone can register a channel and use the service without any conditions like subscribers, views, or channel age.

how_to_register.question: How do I register my channel?
how_to_register.answer: On the Channel Management page, click â€˜Register Channelâ€™ and enter your YouTube channel URL. A unique emoji key will be issued. Add this key to your channel description to complete verification.

channel_suspension.question: What happens if my channel has issues or gets suspended?
channel_suspension.answer: Even if your channel is suspended, you do not owe Audionyx any money. The channelâ€™s music revenue simply becomes 0. There is no obligation to return previously paid revenue or pay additional fees. Channel operation is the creatorâ€™s responsibility, and no financial burden occurs even for penalties due to policy violations.

multiple_channels.question: Can I register multiple channels?
multiple_channels.answer: Yes, you can register multiple YouTube channels under a single account. Each channel receives a unique emoji key and is managed individually.

find_music_feature.question: How do I use the Find Music feature?
find_music_feature.answer: On the Find Music page, filter by genre, mood, or useâ€‘case, or search by keyword to find tracks. You can preview tracks and see waveforms to understand characteristics. Autocomplete helps search faster.

download_music.question: Can I download tracks?
download_music.answer: Currently, only preview is available. Download capability will be added in a future update.

copyright_issues.question: Are there copyright issues when using the music?
copyright_issues.answer: All Audionyx tracks are original works produced by our inâ€‘house producer team. We register copyrights and issue ISRCs for all tracks. There are no legal copyright issues. However, channel registration and verification are required before use.

remix_allowed.question: Can I remix an Audionyx beat or add vocals?
remix_allowed.answer: Derivative works are allowed and follow the same revenue sharing conditions as the original. Credit to the original is required, and inappropriate lyrics or content may be restricted.

volume_detection.question: If I lower the background volume, will CID fail to detect?
volume_detection.answer: At volumes above âˆ’18 LUFS itâ€™s recognized normally. If the volume is too low (below âˆ’24 LUFS), detection accuracy may drop. Maintain an appropriate level.

how_to_request.question: How do I request Track Production?
how_to_request.answer: On the Track Production page, provide the title, BPM, genre, and detailed description of the desired music, plus a reference URL and contact. You can request without logging in and track status in real time.

production_cost.question: Is there any cost for Track Production?
production_cost.answer: Submitting a production request is free. We will review each request and inform you about feasibility and conditions.

request_status.question: How can I check the status of my request?
request_status.answer: Check the â€˜My Requestsâ€™ section at the bottom of the Track Production page. Statuses are â€˜Pendingâ€™, â€˜In Progressâ€™, and â€˜Doneâ€™.

account_registration.question: How do I register a bank account?
account_registration.answer: On the Bank Account page, enter bank, account number, and account holder to register. For security, account numbers are partially masked on screen and can be edited anytime.

revenue_distribution.question: How is revenue shared?
revenue_distribution.answer: Revenue from videos using the music is shared between the creator and Audionyx. Specific share ratios and cycles will be announced separately.

account_security.question: Is my account information stored securely?
account_security.answer: Yes. All account data is encrypted and stored securely. When displayed, part of the account number is masked.

settlement_schedule.question: When can I see my settlement report and when is the payout deposited?
settlement_schedule.answer: We provide a settlement report by the end of M+2 from the upload date of your content using Audionyx music, and deposit by the end of M+3.
settlement_schedule.example:
Example (settled monthly by the following basis):
Jan 15 Upload a video using Audionyx music
By Mar 30 Settlement report provided (sales 1/15â€“1/31)
By Apr 30 Deposit made (sales 1/15â€“1/31)

minimum_payment.question: What is the minimum payout amount?
minimum_payment.answer: Audionyx settles monthly even for as little as 1 KRW.

tax_deduction.question: The settlement amount differs from the actual deposit.
tax_deduction.answer: The settlement amount is preâ€‘withholding. 3.3% withholding tax is deducted before deposit.

paypal_overseas.question: For overseas residents, can I receive payouts via PayPal?
paypal_overseas.answer: We plan to introduce PayPal payouts in Q4 2025. Currently, payouts are only available to domestic bank accounts.

deleted_video_revenue.question: If the video is deleted, do I need to return royalties already received?
deleted_video_revenue.answer: No. Paid amounts are not reclaimed. However, revenue from videos deleted after the settlement cutoff date will be excluded from future settlements.

external_requirements.question: Are there requirements for registering as an external producer?
external_requirements.answer: Submit at least 3 tracks in your portfolio with relevant experience. Weâ€™ll review and contact you. Thereâ€™s no genre/style restriction, but quality must fit the Audionyx brand.

project_file_sales.question: Can I sell DAW project files?
project_file_sales.answer: Starting in 2026, the â€˜Producer Storeâ€™ will enable sales of MIDI, stems, and project files. For now, only completed tracks can be registered.

login_issues.question: Login isnâ€™t working. What should I do?
login_issues.answer: We provide multiple login methods: Google, Kakao, Naver, email, phone. If one fails, try another. If problems persist, clear your browser cache or try a different browser.

audio_playback_issues.question: What if tracks do not play?
audio_playback_issues.answer: Browser autoplay policies may prevent playback. Refresh the page or click another track first, then try again.

additional_inquiries.question: How can I contact support for additional inquiries?
additional_inquiries.answer: Leave your contact when requesting Track Production, or reach us via the email provided during channel registration. Dedicated support channels will be added later.
